title: Permits counties, towns, cities and villages to dispose of drugs by incineration without first obtaining a variance
summary: Permits counties, towns, cities and villages to dispose of drugs by incineration without first obtaining a variance.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          183

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen. MAZIARZ -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation  to  the
         disposal of drugs by incineration

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Title 27 of article 27 of  the  environmental  conservation
    2  law, as added by chapter 625 of the laws of 2008, is amended by adding a
    3  new section 27-2705 to read as follows:
    4  S 27-2705. DISPOSAL OF DRUGS BY INCINERATION.
    5    ANY  COUNTY,  TOWN,  CITY  OR  VILLAGE  IN THIS STATE MAY APPLY TO THE
    6  DEPARTMENT FOR A PERMIT TO INCINERATE UNUSED, UNWANTED OR EXPIRED  DRUGS
    7  AT  FACILITIES  OWNED  AND  MAINTAINED  BY  SUCH  COUNTY,  TOWN, CITY OR
    8  VILLAGE. SUCH APPLICATION FOR SUCH PERMIT SHALL BE IN A MANNER AND  FORM
    9  TO  BE  DETERMINED  BY  THE  DEPARTMENT. SUCH PERMIT, WHEN ISSUED, SHALL
   10  PERMIT SUCH COUNTY, TOWN, CITY OR VILLAGE TO DISPOSE OF DRUGS BY  INCIN-
   11  ERATION  WITHOUT FIRST OBTAINING A VARIANCE FROM THE DEPARTMENT. AS PART
   12  OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS, THE DEPARTMENT SHALL TAKE  SUFFICIENT  STEPS
   13  AND MAKE SUFFICIENT INSPECTIONS OF THE INCINERATION FACILITIES FOR WHICH
   14  SUCH  PERMIT  IS SOUGHT IN ORDER TO INSURE THAT THE DISPOSAL OF DRUGS BY
   15  INCINERATION SHALL BE HAD IN A MANNER TO COMPLY WITH  ALL  ENVIRONMENTAL
   16  AND HEALTH REQUIREMENTS ASSOCIATED WITH SUCH INCINERATION.
   17    S  2.  This  act shall take effect on the thirtieth day after it shall
   18  have become a law.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01039-01-1
